item.title: WSL Pentesting
item.description: Interesting Files link cat /etc/wsl.conf Escape WSL to Windows Host Machine linkIf weâ€™are currently on WSL machine, we can access to the host Windows machine as below. cd /mnt/c/ If /mnt/c/ is empty, we need to mount the folder by running the following command. cd / # -t: Limit the set of filesystem types # drvfs: A plugin for WSL # C: : Specify the Windows root mount -t drvfs C: /mnt/c
